1.title: Interest
1.question: Which of the following thoughts have the highest connection to you?
1.a: I always want to finish every task. I cannot leave things uncomplete.
1.b: I always think there are better ways to illustrate my ideas than others.
1.c: I'm always alert, physically fit and bold.
1.d: I feel good with smells, tastes and visuals.

2.title: Responsibility
2.question: If you were to work 24 hours without sleep, which of the following scenario that you are most suited?
2.a: An important medical device is needed at a local hospital. You must ensure that the medical device reaches the hospital earliest possible.
2.b: A delegate of 1000 foreigners are coming to Malaysia next week. You must submit your event proposal and cost estimate to them tomorrow.
2.c: A large fire happens on a large tower. You must ensure that the 2000 occupants are safe and evacuated.
2.d: A major sport event is happening in Malaysia. You must provide 25000 athletes with their meals that meets dietary requirements.

3.title: Work Life
3.question: Which of the following career would you choose if the salary per month is the same?
3.a: You need to travel overseas 4 times a month and miss your Hari Raya.
3.b: Works from home and able to send your kids to school. You have to work late nights.
3.c: You are required to pass a physical fitness test every year. The people you helped remembers you forever.
3.d: You need to create a new food menu every month and explore other food choices globally. You will get a lot of negative comments on whatever you do.

5.title: Accountability
5.question: Which of the following scenario that you think you can save the day?
5.a: Your colleague Angela is supposed to submit a permit application to MOH today. However, Angela did not turn up to work this morning.
5.b: Your colleague Ragethan creates a poster for Malaysian Tourism and you think his design is not acceptable. The poster must be submitted to the Minster in 2 hours.
5.c: Your colleague Ariff is the head to a team of 100 security personnels assigned to protect the Indonesian President who is visiting Malaysia.
5.d: Your colleague Siew Mun is representing your company in the world cooking championship. Siew Mun is hospitalised for cancer.
